altername_name: Personal Yoga Training: Learn in 15 Minutes a Day
name: Quick Yoga Training: Learn in Minutes a Day
overview: Accessible to everyone, ranging from beginners to experienced Yoga fans Follow along with your own virtual trainer All exercises approved and motion captured by certified instructor Mai Hashimoto of the Swami Vivekananda Yoga Research Foundation Over 180 poses to choose from Practice your yoga hands-free with voice navigation and voice recognition
